translation: Fear not, for you do not fight alone.{#Name="Michael"}
source: Fear not, for you do not fight alone.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Your dragon's protection must be a welcome thing indeed.{LF}You should thank him.{#Name="Michael"}
source: Your dragon's protection must be a welcome thing indeed.{LF}You should thank him.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: I'm...dreaming again...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm...dreaming again...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Not every dragon is like you, Michael.{LF}...Unfortunately.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Not every dragon is like you, Michael.{LF}...Unfortunately.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 消去{#Name=" "}
source: 消去{#Name=" "}

translation: The mountain breeze feels good, doesn't it?{#Name="Dito"}
source: The mountain breeze feels good, doesn't it?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Beats all that sticky saltwater air clinging to your skin.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Beats all that sticky saltwater air clinging to your skin.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: ...Or the sticky, sweaty touch of Lady Five.{LF}God, I think I'm gonna gag.{#Name="Dito"}
source: ...Or the sticky, sweaty touch of Lady Five.{LF}God, I think I'm gonna gag.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hey, you shouldn't talk like that.{LF}You're her disciple!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey, you shouldn't talk like that.{LF}You're her disciple!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: A disciple's supposed to be nice to his Intoner!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: A disciple's supposed to be nice to his Intoner!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Heh. Like I give a good goddamn.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Heh. Like I give a good goddamn.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ol' Blubber Bags went and kicked the bucket, remember?{LF}She doesn't mean squat to me anymore.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ol' Blubber Bags went and kicked the bucket, remember?{LF}She doesn't mean squat to me anymore.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You saw it yourself, didn't you?{#Name="Dito"}
source: You saw it yourself, didn't you?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: The way my blade split those ridiculous funbags{LF}clean in two? It was like fine art!{#Name="Dito"}
source: The way my blade split those ridiculous funbags{LF}clean in two? It was like fine art!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: 消去{#Name=" "}
source: 消去{#Name=" "}

translation: 消去{#Name=" "}
source: 消去{#Name=" "}

translation: 消去{#Name=" "}
source: 消去{#Name=" "}

translation: What a way to go, huh? I should've been a butcher.{LF}Ha ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}
source: What a way to go, huh? I should've been a butcher.{LF}Ha ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hey, Zero? Do we really have to go kill Four?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey, Zero? Do we really have to go kill Four?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Not this again.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Not this again.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's just... I felt really bad for Five, you know?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It's just... I felt really bad for Five, you know?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: She was crying. She was crying a lot,{LF}and you killed her anyway.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: She was crying. She was crying a lot,{LF}and you killed her anyway.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You know that was just an act, right?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You know that was just an act, right?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeah, trust me—if there's one thing Five was good at,{LF}it was faking.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, trust me—if there's one thing Five was good at,{LF}it was faking.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Well, I don't like it. I still think you should stop killing your sisters!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Well, I don't like it. I still think you should stop killing your sisters!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Uh-huh.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Uh-huh.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Family is family. You're supposed to get along.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Family is family. You're supposed to get along.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: There's nothing worse than sisters fighting each other.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: There's nothing worse than sisters fighting each other.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: All right, let's pretend for a second.{LF}Imagine there's a big pile of raw meat here, okay?{#Name="Zero"}
source: All right, let's pretend for a second.{LF}Imagine there's a big pile of raw meat here, okay?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oooh! Yummy!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Oooh! Yummy!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Now, if you divided that meat among all the dragons{LF}in the world, you'd only get a little bit.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Now, if you divided that meat among all the dragons{LF}in the world, you'd only get a little bit.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's right! Just one teeeny tiny bite.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: That's right! Just one teeeny tiny bite.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: But you'd rather have it all to yourself, right?{#Name="Zero"}
source: But you'd rather have it all to yourself, right?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, yeah! I'd want the whole big pile!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Well, yeah! I'd want the whole big pile!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Well, I want to kill my sisters so I can have the world to myself.{LF}...Make sense?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, I want to kill my sisters so I can have the world to myself.{LF}...Make sense?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Um... No, I don't get it.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Um... No, I don't get it.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Never mind.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Never mind.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Come on, let's go. I've got a sister to murder.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Come on, let's go. I've got a sister to murder.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Okaaay...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Okaaay...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: After defeating Five in the Land of Seas,{#Name="Accord"}
source: After defeating Five in the Land of Seas,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Zero took Dito, her sister's disciple, and made for her next destination.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Zero took Dito, her sister's disciple, and made for her next destination.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The Land of Mountains...{#Name="Accord"}
source: The Land of Mountains...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Home to an impenetrable alpine citadel{#Name="Accord"}
source: Home to an impenetrable alpine citadel{#Name="Accord"}

translation: governed by the chaste Intoner known as Four.{#Name="Accord"}
source: governed by the chaste Intoner known as Four.{#Name="Accord"}
